fullText: The show is at its best when it's being purely silly, reveling in the cartoon logic that made the movie so endearing, and at its worst when it tries to be something more substantial than it is.

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The review presents a balanced critique acknowledging both the show's strengths (silly cartoon logic) and weaknesses (overreaching ambitions), with no clear recommendation either way. | GPT-4o-mini: The review indicates a mixed experience, highlighting both enjoyable and disappointing aspects of the show.
